content:
Hi all,

In a transplantation project we want to encode the information how many CD34+ positive cells were transplanted from the donor to the recipient. In more detail, we want to code 2 things: 1) CD34+ cell, and 2) numerical value with a unit (e.g. 4.5 Mio/kg). Can this be encoded into an observation, or is this the wrong resource?

Thanks a lot for your help
Philipp
Yes, Observation seems the right way to do it. Don't know if there is a standard code (eg LOINC) for 'CD34+ positive cell transplated'
